cadence-starts-with-universal: Cadence starts with universal activities—work, rest, movement—but life is more than categories. Love bird gazing? Add custom activities that make your rhythm uniquely yours.

ever-wonder-what-you-did-last: Ever wonder what you did last Tuesday? Or what thoughts you had during a quiet morning? Notes help you hold onto the moments that matter—big or small, deep or fleeting.

sage-your-friendly-ai-guide-wi: Sage your friendly AI guide will help you notice the patterns in your time.\n\nAsk Sage to summarize your day, help you remember your goals, or notice your time patterns. The more you log, the more Sage can help.
scan-this-qr-code-with-your-ne: Scan this QR code with your new device to import the encryption key.

sign-in.failed-to-sign-in-with-social-provider-p: Failed to sign in with social provider. Please try again.
sign-in.sign-in-incomplete-additional-verificati: Sign-in incomplete. Additional verification may be needed.
sign-in.title: Sign In
sign-in.welcome-back-signed-in-successfully: Welcome back! You have signed in successfully.

since-all-notification-types-a: Since all notification types are disabled, push notifications have been turned off automatically.
subscription-activated-successfully: Your subscription has been activated successfully!
subscription-info-text: Currently, we do not have premium functionalities, all our users have access to all our latest functionalities. However, we need to crowdfund our platform to continue developing and help people manage their life. If you are enthusiast to mental health, support us. You will be named on our Sponsor website.
subscription-terms: Subscription auto-renews unless cancelled. Terms and conditions apply.
thank-you-your-bug-report-has: Thank you! Your bug report has been submitted.
thank-you-your-feature-request: Thank you! Your feature request has been sent to our development team.
the-password-should-be-at-least: - The password should be at least
this-action-cannot-be-undone-a: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your account permanently?
this-device-doesnt-have-an-enc: This device doesn't have an encryption key. You need to import a key from your previous device to access encrypted data.
time-moves-fast-cadence-helps: Time moves fast—Cadence helps you see it more clearly. Record your moments, reflect on your rhythms, and discover patterns that shape your days. No pressure, no perfection—just awareness.
to-delete-your-account-please: To delete your account, please contact our support team. They will help you with the account deletion process and ensure all your data is properly removed.
to-modify-notification-permiss: To modify notification permissions at the system level, please go to your device's Settings app and find this app's notification settings.
turn-on-notifications-for-gent: Turn on notifications for gentle reminders to log your activities throughout the day. No pressure, just a daily nudge to help you stay aware of your time.\n\n✨ Your future self will thank you. Take a moment to log your day.
unable-to-open-email-app-pleas: Unable to open email app. Please send your support request to: dev@cadence.day
unable-to-submit-bug-report-pl: Unable to submit bug report. Please try again or contact support.
use-camera-to-scan-qr-code: Use camera to scan QR code
user-not-found-please-sign-in: User not found. Please sign in again.
verification-code-sent-check-your-email: Verification code sent. Check your email.
we-are-working-on-improving-the-app-your: We are working on improving the app. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated. You can find the link to the feedback page under the profile.
we-collect-your-email-for-foll: We collect your email (for follow-up), app version & platform, the bug details you provide, optional reproduction steps, and a timestamp/device info so we can investigate and follow up.
were-here-to-help-our-support: We're here to help! Our support team typically responds within 24 hours. For urgent issues, please include as much detail as possible in your message.
weve-sent-a-verification-code-to: We've sent a verification code to
your-account-security-is-impor: Your account security is important to us. Password changes require email verification for your protection. Contact support for account deletion requests.
your-encryption-key-protects-s: Your encryption key protects sensitive data. Keep it secure and don't share it with others. You'll need this key to access your encrypted data on new devices.
your-password-has-been-changed: Your password has been changed successfully. For security reasons, you'll be signed out now.
your-time-is-yours-alone-every: Your time is yours alone. Everything you log is encrypted and stored securely. No ads, no tracking, no sharing your information—just a safe space for self-reflection.

auth.subtitle: Sign in to your legacy account to migrate your data to the new system
auth.failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.

full-run.title: Confirm Full Migration
full-run.confirm: This will migrate all your data from the source database to the target database. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
